p: A total number of 11 L. monocytogenes isolates collected from the blood or cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) of patients diagnosed with invasive listeriosis in Ancona province (Italy) from 2014 to 2016 were investigated in the study (Table 1). The 2015 and 2016 isolates had already been characterized in terms of antibiotic resistance phenotype and molecular typing/genetic relatedness (Marini et al., 2016).
